title: No Need To

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Persuade up to two players per night, roleblocking them and cancelling their action for the night.
- Relent, resolving every action you have cancelled so far in the game and additionally performing them yourself. This happens automatically when you die.
Attributes:
- You cannot target the same person two nights in a row
- Your targets will be informed that they have been visited by a No Need To.
